caption.center: Ivan Russell DAVIS v. STATE of Mississippi.

opinion.posture: Appeal No. 87-10010 from Judgment dated February 08, 1988; Robert T. Mills, Ruling Judge, Jackson County Circuit Court.
opinion.attorneys:
Ross Parker Simons, Pascagoula, for appellant.
Mike C. Moore, Atty. Gen., Deirdre McCrory, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., Jackson, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before ROY NOBLE LEE, C.J., and ANDERSON and PITTMAN, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed.
HAWKINS and DAN M. LEE, P.JJ., and PRATHER, ROBERTSON, SULLIVAN and BLASS, JJ., concur.
Affirmed.
